label: Wet Lab Validation
description: General wet lab validation planning module for cosmetics, functional food/beverage, supplements, pharma, and adjacent categories. Produces a study roadmap based on product specs, compliance expectations, methods, budget, and timeline constraints.

defaultInputs.name: Input Data
defaultInputs.description: Initial product/specification data and study assumptions (may include formula/composition, specs, and constraints).

defaultOutputs.name: Validation Plan
defaultOutputs.description: Generated wet lab validation plan (tests, methods, sampling schedule, acceptance criteria, budget fit, and timeline).

defaultOutputs.name: Risks & Assumptions
defaultOutputs.description: Key risks, gaps, and assumptions identified from inputs (no inferred data).
